Title: Sons of My Brothers
Writer: Sinisa Kovacevic (play), Sinisa Kovacevic (screenplay), D. Daniel Vujic
Actors: Petar Kralj, Miodrag Krivokapic, Ljiljana Blagojevic, Vuk Kostic
Plot: The movie "Sinovci" is a story of two worlds, the world of the dead and the world of the living , those who have already suffered and those yet to be sacrificed for the fatherland.
